alert.note: Alert for Banner; Kimball; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 03 at 3:49AM CDT until November 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Scotts Bluff County, Banner County and Kimball County. In Wyoming, Goshen County and East Laramie County. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread strong crosswinds could create hazardous travel for all motorists on Interstate 80 between Wyoming mile marker 383 and the Nebraska state line...to Nebraska Interstate mile marker 35. Light weight and high profile vehicles including light load semis and those towing camper trailers will be especially at risk.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
